title: Large 3BR in Edgewater 2-Flat
posting_body: See this 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment for rent in an owner-occupied 2-flat in Edgewater, Chicago.
Large living room, dining room, and cozy eat-in kitchen.
Complimentary laundry & storage space in the building.
Tenants pay for their electricity and cooking gas.
Large vintage apartment with Arts & Crafts moldings and stained glass.
A security deposit of $2,000 is required.
Strenuous credit and background checks are required (however, no application fees).
Up to 2 cats are allowed (sorry, no dogs).
Secure building with video security and fenced-in backyard.
This apartment in Edgewater is located within a primarily residential area.
Walking distance to Whole Foods, Aldi, Walgreens, CVS, library, and red line trains.
Away from the Thorndale EL <-> Senn HS corridor.
